job.title: Lead Data Scientist
job.description: ulliWe are a big Python shop Ideally we like folks who worked in Python but will also talk to someone with R backgroundliliLead Data Scientist wont manage a team hands on individual contributorliliComfort in environments where large projects are timeboxed and therefore consequential design decisions may need to be made and acted upon rapidlyliliWe like people who has experience with any of these areas Deep Learning and its many incarnations eg Adversarial Networks Convolutional Networks Recurrent  Recursive  Residual Nets Natural Language Processing NLP image recognition anomaly detection speech recognition timeseries forecasting geospatial modeling Bayesian Networks or Bayesian inference more generally Reinforcement Learning Unsupervised techniques or other data science and statistical tools and methodsliliCandidates with fluency in the mathematical primitives and generalizations of data science  eg expertise in Linear Algebra and Vector Calculus usually do wellliliSolid theoretical grounding in the mathematical core of the major ideas in data scienceliul
